name: Addictol
effects: Removes all addictions

name: Antibiotics
effects: Cures all illnesses

name: Berry Mentats
effects: Reduce the difficulty of INT tests by 2 (minimum 0)
addiction: Mentat Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Mentats. You increase the difficulty of all CHA tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Mentat (ordinary Mentats, or the Berry, Grape, or Orange versions).

name: Buffjet
effects: Reduce the difficulty of all STR and END tests by 1 (minimum 0). +4 Max HP, Gain 3 AP immediately (lost if not spent), Extra actions cost 1 less AP
addiction: Buffout Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Buffout. You increase the difficulty of all STR and END tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Buffout (Buffout, Buffjet, or Bufftats).

name: Buffout
effects: Re-roll 1d20 on all STR and END tests, +3 Max HP
addiction: Buffout Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Buffout. You increase the difficulty of all STR and END tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Buffout (Buffout, Buffjet, or Bufftats).

name: Bufftats
effects: Bufftats
addiction: Buffout Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Buffout. You increase the difficulty of all STR and END tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Buffout (Buffout, Buffjet, or Bufftats).

name: Calmex
effects: Re-roll 1d20 on all PER and AGI tests, +2CD to sneak attack damage
addiction: Calmex Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Calmex. You suffer complications on AGI tests on all rolls of 18 or higher whenever you are not under the effects of Calmex.

name: Daddy-O
effects: Reduce the difficulty of all PER and INT tests by 1 (minimum 0), +1 difficulty to CHA tests
addiction: Daddy-O Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Daddy-O. You increase the difficulty of all PER and INT tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of Daddy-O

name: Day Tripper
effects: Reduce the difficulty of CHA and LCK tests by 1 (minimum 0), +1 difficulty to STR tests
addiction: Day Tripper Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Day Tripper. You increase the difficulty of all CHA and LCK tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of Day Tripper.

name: Fury
effects: +3 Physical damage resistance. +3CD to melee damage, +2 difficulty to all PER tests
addiction: Fury Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Fury. You increase the difficulty of all STR and PER tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of Fury.

name: Grape Mentats
effects: Reduce the difficulty of CHA tests by 2, to a minimum of 0, Re-roll 1d20 on Barter tests.
addiction: Mentat Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Mentats. You increase the difficulty of all CHA tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Mentat (ordinary Mentats, or the Berry, Grape, or Orange versions).

name: Healing Salve
effects: Heals 2 HP
notes: Healing salve can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 2 HP immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, adding +2 to the number of HP healed overall.

name: Jet
effects: Extra actions cost 1 less AP
addiction: Jet Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Jet. You increase the difficulty of all AGI tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Jet (Jet, or Jet Fuel; Ultra Jet has a different addiction effect).

name: Jet Fuel
effects: Gain 1 free AP at the start of each turn
addiction: Jet Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Jet. You increase the difficulty of all AGI tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Jet (Jet, or Jet Fuel; Ultra Jet has a different addiction effect).

name: Med-X
effects: +3 Physical damage resistance
addiction: Med-X Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Med-X. You increase the difficulty of all AGI tests by +1, and suffer +1CD  additional damage from all physical attacks whenever you are not under the effects of Med-X.

name: Mentats
effects: Re-roll 1d20 on PER and INT tests
addiction: Mentat Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Mentats. You increase the difficulty of all CHA tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Mentat (ordinary Mentats, or the Berry, Grape, or Orange versions).

name: Orange Mentats
effects: Reduce the difficulty of PER tests by 2 (min. 0), Aim minor action lets you re-roll one additional d20.
addiction: Mentat Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Mentats. You increase the difficulty of all CHA tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Mentat (ordinary Mentats, or the Berry, Grape, or Orange versions).

name: Overdrive
effects: +3CD damage to all attacks, May re-roll up to 3CD per damage roll
addiction: Overdrive Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Overdrive. You increase the difficulty of all STR and AGI tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of Overdrive

name: Psycho
effects: +2CD damage to all attacks, +3 Physical damage resistance
addiction: Psycho Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Psycho. You increase the difficulty of all STR tests by +1 and suffer +1CD  damage from all physical attacks whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Psycho (ordinary Psycho, Psycho Jet, Psychobuff, or Psychotats).

name: Psycho Jet
effects: +2CD damage to all attacks, +4 Physical damage resistance. Gain 4 AP immediately (lost if not spent)
addiction: Psycho Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Psycho. You increase the difficulty of all STR tests by +1 and suffer +1CD  damage from all physical attacks whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Psycho (ordinary Psycho, Psycho Jet, Psychobuff, or Psychotats).

name: Psychobuff
effects: +2CD damage to all attacks, +4 Max HP.Reduce difficulty of all STR and END tests by 1 (minimum 0).
addiction: Psycho Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Psycho. You increase the difficulty of all STR tests by +1 and suffer +1CD  damage from all physical attacks whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Psycho (ordinary Psycho, Psycho Jet, Psychobuff, or Psychotats).

name: Psychotats
effects: +2CD damage to all attacks, +2 Physical damage resistance, Reduce difficulty of PER tests by 1 (min. 0)
addiction: Psycho Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Psycho. You increase the difficulty of all STR tests by +1 and suffer +1CD  damage from all physical attacks whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Psycho (ordinary Psycho, Psycho Jet, Psychobuff, or Psychotats).

name: Rad-X
effects: +6 Radiation damage resistance

name: Rad-X (Diluted)
effects: +3 Radiation damage resistance

name: RadAway
effects: Heals 4 Radiation damage
notes: RadAway can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 4 Radiation damage immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 4 Radiation damage in addition to any other healing done (remove Radiation damage before applying other healing effects). Diluted RadAway works in the same way, but only heals 2 Radiation damage.

name: RadAway (Diluted)
effects: Heals 2 Radiation damage
notes: RadAway can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 4 Radiation damage immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 4 Radiation damage in addition to any other healing done (remove Radiation damage before applying other healing effects). Diluted RadAway works in the same way, but only heals 2 Radiation damage.

name: Skeeto Spit
effects: +2 Max HP

name: Stimpak
effects: Heals 4 HP
notes: A Stimpak can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 4 HP or treating an Injury immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 4 HP or treating an Injury in addition to any other healing done.

name: Stimpak (Diluted)
effects: Heals 2 HP
notes: A Diluted Stimpak can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 2 HP or treating an Injury immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 2 HP or treating an Injury in addition to any other healing done.

name: Super Stimpak
effects: Heals 8 HP
notes: A super Stimpak can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 8 HP or treating up to two Injuries immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 8 HP or treating up to two Injuries in addition to any other healing done.

name: Stimpak Diffuser
effects: Heals 4 HP to all within Close range
notes: When deployed, using the Interact minor action, it produces a cloud which immediately heals 4 HP on everyone (other than robots) within Close range. One super Stimpak is consumed every time the Stimpak diffuser is used.

name: Ultra jet
effects: Gain 6 AP immediately (lost if not spent), Extra actions cost 1 less AP
addiction: Ultra Jet Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Ultra Jet. You increase the difficulty of all AGI tests by +1, and you generate one fewer AP whenever you succeed at a skill test (minimum 0) whenever you are not under the effects of Ultra Jet. This addiction is permanent and cannot be cured by any known means.

name: X-Cell
effects: First d20 bought on all tests is free
addiction: X-Cell Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to X-Cell. You increase the difficulty of all tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of X-Cell.
